subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Alex Dragicevich hit four 3-pointers and scored a career-high 22 points to lead host Notre Dame (9-5) to a 72-59 win over No. 22 Pittsburgh (11-3) in the teams’ Big East opener.
snippet: Alex Dragicevich hit four 3-pointers and scored a career-high 22 points to lead host Notre Dame (9-5) to a 72-59 win over No. 22 Pittsburgh (11-3) in the teams’ Big East opener.
